dcterms:description: A dataset used for machine translation from English to German, consisting of 4.5 million sentence pairs, following the setup of Vaswani et al. (2017).
dcterms:title: WMT 2014 English-German

dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset for measuring progress in statistical language modeling, consisting of one billion words.
